munit:test.doc:description:
Purpose of this test suite:
Challenge1-1: Happy Path: - Test creating an appointment when database creds are correct - Test creating an appointment when all required fields are present
Sad Path: - Test creating an appointment when one of the required fields is missing - Test creating an appointment when more than one required fields is missing - Test creating an appointment when database creds are incorrect - Test creating an appointment when database server is down
Challenge1-2: - My test would check if all required fields are passed - My test would check if the appointment has been created in the database - My test would check http status code and message in response
